entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:38 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023
